channel.title: Automated tests
channel.description:
I'm pleased to introduce [Pubco](https://gitlab.com/taverntown/pubco/), the automated tests repository for Tavern.
I think that automated testing is going to be essential to keeping test code coverage high, as well as ensuring that long-term federation compatibility. This repository contains all of the scripts and documentation to spin up a multi-instance Tavern cluster with the help of docker-compose and [ngrok](https://ngrok.com/) and execute automated tests using [nightwatchjs](https://nightwatchjs.org/).
Demo: https://youtu.be/-VmEu-iaBYk
